item.title: Farmers queue up for urea amid heavy rains in Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Farmers queue up for urea amid heavy rains in Gadwal
Farmers in Jogulamba Gadwal district queued in the rain outside PACS offices on Thursday seeking urea. With fertiliser stocks inadequate, long waits led to frustration. Anticipating unrest, district officials deployed police at the premises.
By Telangana Today Published Date - 28 August 2025, 10:39 AM
JOGULAMBA GADWAL: Braving intermittent rains, farmers continued to wait in long queues for urea in the district on Thursday.

item.author: Telangana Today

item.title: Farmers queue up for urea amid heavy rains in Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Braving intermittent rains, farmers continued to wait in long queues for urea in the district on Thursday.
From as early as 5 am, men and women gathered at the Primary Agricultural Cooperative Society (PACS) office in the town, standing in serpentine lines in the hope of securing
fertiliser.
Despite enduring long hours in the rain, farmers complained that urea was not being supplied due to inadequate stocks.
â€œWe have left our work in the fields and have been standing here s...]]>
item.author: News
